title: Thousand-Faced Shadow

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you successfully kill someone, you may have their role, will, and cause of death be displayed as whatever you want.
- When you successfully kill someone, choose another killing role in the game not deemed unbalanced by the Role Jury. You become that role, except you're Neutral Killing and you keep your existing abilities and attributes. (Your goal and alignment stay the same, you don't have access to factional chats or kills, etc.)
- As long as your role is Thousand-Faced Shadow, you may make any number of actions each night as long as those actions each come from a different role.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all who would oppose you.
